channel.title: About the Class/Lore/Fanfic category
channel.description:
Use this category to discuss lore/fanfic/class suggestions related to _Throne of Lies_.
* Class suggestions, including serious suggestions, funny/parodies, alterations of existing classes, dream classes, etc. For serious classes, you may want to post a link from here to #feedback
* Fanfic/lore suggestions -- Nothing NSFW (or borderline)
Be creative - Have fun ~

item.title: About the Class/Lore/Fanfic category
